text:
POWr.io | SF | Full-time, onsite | https://www.powr.io/jobs

We help small businesses grow online. We’re a small team with a big user base. ie Tons of opportunity to make an impact & grow your skillset. We have never raised a VC round and we’re profitable.

Hiring:

- Junior full-stack engineer

- Senior full-stack engineer

- Junior UX Designer

- Front end engineer

- Business development

- Customer support specialist

Javascript, Rails, Node, Backbone, React, Redux

Please apply at powr.io/jobs
